## spinner package

## Classes

<table><thead><tr><th>

Class


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[SpinnerModel](./spinner.spinnermodel.md)


</td><td>

Spinner component model.

Use `tick()` to start the animation, then handle `TickMsg` in your update function by calling `model.update(msg)`<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[TickMsg](./spinner.tickmsg.md)


</td><td>

Message indicating the spinner should advance one frame.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
